mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_feeling_of_book (ID, CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, FEELING_OF_BOOK_ID, USER_ID, PARENT_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{createdDate}, #{feelingOfBook.id}, #{user.id}, #{parentComment.id});
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT_FEELING_OF_BOOK SET CONTENT = #{content}, MODIFIED_BY = #{modifiedBy}, MODIFIED_DATE = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID AS comment_id, c.CONTENT AS comment_content, c.CREATED_DATE AS comment_created_date, c.USER_ID AS comment_user_id, c.PARENT_ID AS comment_parent_id, c.MODIFIED_DATE AS comment_modified_date, c.MODIFIED_BY AS comment_modified_by, u.FULLNAME AS user_fullname, u.AVATAR AS user_avatar FROM COMMENT_FEELING_OF_BOOK c LEFT JOIN USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.ID OR c.PARENT_ID IS NOT NULL WHERE c.ID = #{id}

SELECT c.id AS comment_id, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.content AS comment_content, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.parent_id AS comment_parent_id, c.modified_date AS comment_modified_date, c.modified_by AS comment_modified_by, u.fullname AS user_fullname, u.avatar AS user_avatar FROM COMMENT_FEELING_OF_BOOK c INNER JOIN USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.id WHERE c.PARENT_ID = #{id}
